attributes.action: Give free formula milk to families on benefits/low income
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The new healthy start scheme has taken away free formula milk for babies.
This is a huge financial burden on people on very low incomes.
It has also taken away women's rights to choose how she wants to feed her child.
Even with healthy start vouchers families could still have to pay up to £5 toward formula milk which is a huge percentage of a small benefit.
